titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Wade v. Miller, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/9/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the 95 current and former Senators named as defendants in the case of Wade v. Miller , et al.
